content.detailedDescription:
I heard a small plane making a lot of noise overhead & looked up to see what kind it was. when i looked up there was a very ,very high plane, going very, very fast, leaving a very small contrail behind. the contrail looked like fat donuts on a thin rope.
by the time i could get to a camera, the jet stream had distorted the contrail to the point it wasn't clear any longer.
the plane must have been flying at 50,000 ft or more. as it was just a small dark dot in the sky.
content.summary: Donuts on a rope or smoke rings on a string

content.detailedDescription: I just got up at 5:11 to go to work and i went to make a cup of coffe when i remembered that i left my coffe cup in the car cup holder when i saw above a small tree and i saw it twice as big as a semi-truck with blue lights at the bottom i got so scared i ran inside and never told any one i live alone.I noticed it by a storng force of air or wind.It stayed there for ten hole seconds then a churning sound started and it went bright red then a flash of light and it was gone.
content.shape: Boomerang,  Bullet,  Missile,  Circle,  Disc,  Flash,  Unknown
content.summary: Staying in place then flying fast to the hills

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down to my freinds race car shop , with is a 1.5 miles from my house,as i was driving something flew over me very close and very fast, it suprise me so much i hit the brakes,the red lights lite up the hood of my truck ,it made no noise and moving very very fast it took just seconds and all i could see was the red lights, it was heading ne and turn e and turn s and slow down to a crawl,i watch it as it was flying right over i69 very slow appox. 150 feet above ,it took about 10 mins and i lost site of it in the tree line. in the last year i have seen many  things in sky at night close to my home, bright color lights, ect.I don't know want what all going on,or if the army is flying things out of ft. custer in this area....
content.summary: Large triangle with 4 red lights

content.detailedDescription:
In portuguese:
sai para fumar na sacada do meu apartamento.
mais ou menos 1 minuto depois, passou perto do aeroporto de miami, mais ou menos umas 3 milhas de distancia do meu predio e mais ou menos 1 milha do aeroporto, em uma velocidade 1/3 da velocidade de chegada dos avioes, algo do tamanho de um mono motor ou um pouco maior, girando sentido anti horario, demorando de 8 a 10 segundos para fazer um giro completo, algo entre cinza e preto, nao tinha luz, parecia a letra m, mas com a ponta do meio maior que as duas laterais. estava sentido west/east, pelo meu ponto de vista de onde eu estava, passou muito perto do aeroporto em uma velocidade uniforme e seguia mantendo a mesma altura desde o inicio, ate que, depois que passou o aeroporto, subiu na mesma velocidade sem parar ate que desapareceu. o que vejo de diferente nesse sabado, e que seguia uma neblina muito forte desde o dia anterior. seja o que for, parecia que estava sendo carregado por algo, mas nao se via nada em cima. muita gente deve ter visto, mas como eu, so escrevi algo nessa pagina, sou muito ocupado e nao sei porque estou escrevendo isso tudo, talvez para que alguem investigue e depois me diga que algo nao indentificado foi visto no radar, ou que alguem mais se manifestou, ou ate mesmo que nao era nada disso, mas para pelo menos eu saber o que vi.
ah, no inicio, pensei em pegar a camera, mas ao mesmo tempo pensei que podia perder algum momento. nao espero que alguem acredite ou nao, isso e um relato do que aconteceu nesse sabado may/12/2007 13:01 hs.
ah, minha esposa viu e falou que era um helicoptero e disse que nao queria olhar porque estava muita claridade e tambem nao acredita nessas coisas. garanto que helicoptero nao gira sentido anti horario em movimento retilineo.
content.summary: Like a  dark m

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were sitting out on the front porch talking and i looked up to the sky(?) and saw a very bright star-like object, thinking that i hadn't noticed it before. then it started moving upward and out of vision or sight. my daughter also  saw it because she looked up to the sky when i did to see what i was looking up at. (i really don't know what the distance was - that the object was up in the sky). it did not take more than 20 to 25 secound for this to happen. we just sat their for a few moments because we were so startled and shocked.
content.summary: Looked up and saw bright star-like light object move upward and out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I and friends witnessed a hovering craft on the edge of rio, wisconsin. when it hovered over us, a beam of light came down from the craft. we watched the craft for about a 1/2 hour. i don't remeber the craft having any sound. we decided to run to a friends house to get his telescope. when we brought the telesope back to the sight area, as soon as we got it set up and started looking at it, it suddenly zoomed towards the south and was gone in seconds. the paper reported the next day that a military aircraft followed an unidentified aircraft, somewhere in the midwest i believe, and within a short period of time found itself in wyoming or montanta i believe. my friends and i believed at the time that it must have sighted the same craft we had seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering craft with beam of light

content.detailedDescription:
Not sure what i have captured here. 

it was dawn and i was outside letting the dogs out. for some reason, i became very uncomfortable. i grabbed my camera and captured this video. 

it seems to be two objects. if you watch both objects very closely, they seem to make some very unnatural maneuvers. no matter how many times i watch it, they don���t move like bugs and they appear to be a solid. they look almost round to me.

email me at hsibilly@hotmail.Com if you have questions or wish to use this video.
content.summary: North phoenix strange orb / lights

content.detailedDescription: I was in wareham with family and friends sitting on the porch facing northeast. my wife spotted a bright object in the sky that was different than the stars. it was oblong in appearance and i am pretty sure it was off in the distance quite a bit. it appeared to move quickly left and then back right. it was not blinking like a plane, but it was obviously not a star. it "pulsed" brighter a few times and then a beam of light projected from under the bright spot three times. the object became brighter and then it just disappeared.
content.summary: Spotted bright object with trail of light from the bottom

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside in my front yard when i first noticed about four or five bright orange lights not too far off in the distance flying low and slow.  at first i thought it was a few military planes flying in formation, as this area is some kind of military flight training area. but after watching them move for a while, i wasn't so sure about that explanation as it didn't look like they were going anywhere fast, they were just kind of slowly lumbering across the sky.  i watched them for about maybe five or six minutes, and they were heading in my general direction.  the lights finally disappeared behind a nearby mountain and that was the last i saw of them.  

i related this story to a friend that i didn't think would call me crazy.  he told me about a big ufo flap in this same area in the late 1980s with some sightings matching my description.  that is what has led me to research more into this whole thing.  i'm very weirded out by it all.
content.summary: Slow moving orange lights

content.detailedDescription: My closest friends think i'm nuts so i'm not going to bother telling the stories
content.summary: Ive taken many photos of these crafts over the last month

content.detailedDescription:
To the folks in lake tahoe look at these photos submitted last week to ufocasebook. looks like the same craft! i think its some sort of remote electromagnet measuring device and maybe mapping the magnetic fields of the earth.
thanks for posting


http://www.Ufocasebook.Com/strangecraftphotos.Html
content.summary: To the folks who submitted in lake tahoe http://www.Ufocasebook.Com/strangecraftphotos.Html

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in lake tahoe over the weekend. we left on friday afternoon and came back monday morning. on saturday at about 7 pm, i was walking out to my car to get a sweater when i saw this thing in the sky. it was pretty close i think, but still above the trees. it was moving and spinning slowly, heading towards my right. i was startled and confused at first and wanted to take a picture, but our camera was still inside so i took two pictures with my camera phone before it passed behind the roof of the house. i ran around to the other side and was yelling to my husband to come out. we came around the other side and saw it just as it was going down behind some trees. he didn't get a good look at it, but he saw enough to convince him that it was something really strange. we decided to take a drive around the area to see if we could see it again, but we never did. we didn't see it the next day either. since we were renting the cabin for the weekend we didn't know any nearby residents but i would bet at least a few other people saw it. it was very visible and very strange looking. i was definitely a little freaked out but my husband didn't seem very bothered by it. he was more interested in it than scared. he wanted to drive around a lot longer trying to find it than i did! =) it didn't make any noise except for a very, very faint sound that is hard to describe but sounded like something vibrating. we both heard the sound although just barely. it moved in a very straight line when it went over the house but when we saw it on the other side of the house, when it was going down behind the trees, it made a very sharp turn. it didn't move like a helicopter or airplane, it was very "exact". we did see one person on our drive who was a few blocks away taking a walk and asked him if he saw it, and he said no. then we asked him if he heard any weird noise and tried to describe it as best we could, and he said he might have but he wasn't sure. by this time it was at least 20 minutes since we first saw the thing so who knows.

i talked to some friends over the week about sending these to a newspaper or something but a guy at work suggested i look up mufon, so i'm starting with you guys.
content.summary: I saw this thing in the sky at about 7 pm in lake tahoe. it was spinning and moving slowly. took 2 cam phone pics.

content.detailedDescription:
It happened on may 9, 2007 at 11:13pm , we were riding down the road when me and my two kids(15,18) seen a circle of lights that went up then back down and then disappered.
the next night may 10, 2007 between 9 & 9:30 ( i dont know the exact time)
me and my nephew (20) was coming back from taking my aunt  her medicine. we seen the same thing as the night before and then it diusappered also. what makes it strange i was talking on the cell phone with my sister at the time, before i told her about what we were seeing her son ran into the house(hes 19) telling her he seen some lights. that was at the same time we seen them. at the time we were only 3 miles from my sisters house. all this happened in scranton, sc. i was hoping it would come up on the internet somewhere that someone else saw it to.
content.summary: Circle of lights going up and down then suddenly disappears.

content.detailedDescription: The witness was outside in his backyard when he heard the sound of what he thought was a commercial jet airliner, but the sound was different.  when he looked up, he was surprised to see what appeared to be a large commercial sized aircraft with another smaller aircraft grafted to the nose of the large aircraft.  he noted that he could see no engines or engine necelles.  the aircraft was a dark gray color, almost the same color as the overcast which gave it a ghostly appearance.  it seemed to gain altitude, and was lost from view as it blended into the overcast.  although lost from view, he could still hear it as it moved from the northwest to the southeast.
content.summary: Witness observed strange "aircraft" overflying green bay, wisconsin

content.detailedDescription:
Ok this is how it began i got called from my dad and we (me and my mom) had to go to the store for gas and the liqour store. when i'm in the car i always scream ufo to see what my mom thanks of it. she always tells me thats not a ufo you don't have high chances of seeing a ufo through out the whole world. just give it up. so tonight when we were at the store at spring glenn jacksonville,fl as we were coming back towards jax beach on beach blvd. i saw a strange figured-shape going in a rather strange direction very aquirdly.It had about 5 white lights at the bottom side. and 1 that flashed white at the bottom.I said mom what is that she said where i said right there by the trees she said i think thats a plane. i said mom look how can that be a plane when its traveling faster than us not that but getting further ahead of us she said i don't know. i had a feeling that this was no type of man-made or earth like aircraft. so i looked at it carefuuly one more time and saw that it went in a perfectly straight horizontal direction.Then it slowly tilted as if it were trying to fly sraight thrugh the ground with speed increasing trees were in the way of my sighting so it dissapeared. if this was a plane why didnt it have red or blue lights. if this was a blimp why did it travel so fast. if this was a helicopter where were the blades to it.If so a jet why so gigantic. i'm not sure hat it was and it couldn't have been a crash because nothing blew up. it wasn't a landing because there were no airports in the next 30 miles or so it was about half-a-mile away from us.What was it and why did it not come back up?     


1.I was in jacksonville,fl on beach blvd.
at the time i was looking in the sky

2.What made me notice the object was the fact that the lights were so bright it caught my attention

3.I had no idea of what the object was i thought of all possibilities but all were eliminated

4.The object was sort of like a long vertical diamond
it's motions were different from the usual aircrafts i see it went a straight line across then started to tilt in a diagonal angle as if it were trying to strike the ground

5.My feelings were very odd i felt as if i was being watched by something beside humans
my reaction was stay calm and study the object harder while you can after the sighting i couldn't think of what it could have been

6. i lost sight of the object unfortunately because of tall trees this is not a hoax,fake,or any type of joke sometimes people joke around but theres just things like these in life you just dont joke about
content.shape: Cylinder,  Flash,  Oval,  Square,  Rectagular,  Triangle,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Ok i want to be a ufologists this is something i've been looking forward to seeing and it was a type of feeling i've never had!

content.detailedDescription: I like to view live webcams from time to time because you never know what will appear on any givin day or night. i was lucky enough to have captured what i think is not a conventional flying object! i have learned not to just 'save' the picture as the 'saved' picture refreshes when the webcam does, so i use 'print screen' instead so the saved pic remains the same. i have a few pics and i have one that is huge in size so you'll see it much bigger. i can't say for sure, but it looks like it may be a cylinder because of the 'flatness' of it. in any event i think i am lucky to have captured this image.
content.summary: This is a screen capture from http://www.Hazecam.Net/burlington.Html

content.detailedDescription:
First, this will be my last report though mufon. this has been my 5 or 6 posting using this website. i am tired of wasting my time posting and not getting any response but i wanted to share this latest video. if anyone has a comment on the video, please email me at hsibilly@hotmail.Com. please ask permission to use this video anywhere else. thanks

i don���t have the software to cut off the last 2 min of the video, sorry. the first 3 min. are interesting.

this orb was seen on sunday, almost directly above the house. the camera would have been pointed north. the brown object on the top of the video is my rain gutter. the wind was blowing a good 10-15 miles an hour to the east. sorry if my video is shaky, but its very hard to find these things in a 3��� viewfinder.

what���s interesting about this object is that is moves towards the house, parallel to the house, and then back towards the direction it came from. you can see in some parts of the video the objects speed increases and decreases suddenly.

i have been seeing these objects since march 2007. i have taken many pictures and videos. tips to watch these things; use polarized sun glasses to see them better in the day. they someone use the sun to hide, so watching them from under your patio helps. they know when you���re watching because they are watching you. have faith and you will see them. sounds a little nutty but every time i think i am done seeing them, they get a little closer. 

billy
content.summary: Another north phoenix orb sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I went to the park near our home with my wife and dogs on may 6th, 2007 i think it was around 12-2pm. i was taking alot of photographs with my new camera sony 7.2 megapixel. i set the camera at the highest setting and took two photos one of a kite flying, and one of the mountains with the clouds above them.  upon returning home i uploaded the photos into my computer as i was going through the pics i saw something strange on the left corner of the picture above the street light their was a cylindrical object laying horizontal to the ground, but about a 1000 feet over the mountains which i believe are about 1500 to 2000 feet up. as i zoomed in the hair stood up on my arms! i was a cylinder!  then i quickly looked through the other pictures when on my 3 pic i saw another strange thing in the picture. this was the picture of the kite flying, this time i see what looks like a gray disc. when i enlarged it to 200% then 400% i freaked, it was a classic saucer shaped craft! look for yourselves and please tell me what you see. thanks, frank

im concerned about the quality of the pics that i send you. on my photo program (picasa) it enlarges really clear and not pixelated at all. i hope you have the same. if not let me know then maybe i can upload it right from my pic card. thanks, f
content.summary: Ufo's showed up on digital pictures i was taking at the park

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my dog like i am every night around the same time, when i noticed two objects that looked like stars. one was ahead of the other and they were quite a distance apart from each other. the first i noticed was moving in a straight line, fast, then as i looked a little to the left of the sky & the first object, i saw another object same size, the color looked a little different then the first. the first one was more silvery, like a star color, the second was amberish. i watched them until they both went out of view. it was a clear night and i saw planes in the sky before, during and after the sightings. i even said out loud that there were no blinking lights on these two objects like there are on airplanes. i felt like, all right, something is going on because this is not the first time i have seen objects like this. but i have never seen two of them in the same sky and formation at the same time.
content.summary: I noticed two objects moving in a north to south direction.

content.detailedDescription:
We were outside filming in case we saw a ufo/ifo. time was 8:53 p.M. first thought it was a star. then it started to grow in intensity with multi-color flashes. it then zips up to the right and back again stops flashing and drifts off toward the ocean. i have seen a lot of aircraft and this wasnt one that
we are told about.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flashing at first then round super bright sphere glides across sky at  fast speed

content.detailedDescription: Myself and my wife had decided to go and glean the fields for sweet potatoes,and upon loading the car and heading back home which was about a mile from home, right in the clear blue sky on the right appeared this huge craft in the sky, dark brown in color with windows going all around it,there was one woman standing in front of one of the windows as it hovered about a good two hundred feet above the trees, as we were riding in our car i asked my wife do you see that and she said yes, it was so huge and magnificient, i never seen anything on this planet like it before as it hovered over the trees not making a sound and no wind was stirring at all from this huge craft, the tops of the trees didn't move at all, as i sped up to get a better view of the huge craft,i had some trees that blocked our view for maybe 5 seconds as we was clearing the trees with great anticipation to get a better view the huge craft had vanished without a trace. we are a christian family with strong christian values, and when i tell my story of what we saw people really don't believe but i know what i saw and my wife know what she saw,and she does'nt like to talk about it and seems like she's a little different since it happened but we know what we saw. i've been searching the web to try and see something that looks simular but to this date the closest thing i come across is the one this site here.Http://webpark.Sk/ufo.Htm. it looked to be that size with some of those features. i feel that more time had passed than what we could remember but i'm not sure, it didn't dawn on me to look at my watch for the time we were so in awe, but at times i feel more had taken place than whati can remember. after we had encountered it i just remembered being tired,and going to bed early that night. we told some family abuot it but not much was said or done since.In school i used to be a fairly good artist,now i just can't seem to even draw what we saw on paper.
content.summary: Was seen by two people simulstaneously.

content.detailedDescription: To be honest i have no idea what this object is. all i know is while trying to take a picture of the moon,from my front yard, looking into the western sky, i seen nothing but the moon before and after i took the picture, in fact i took two pics and didnt notice anything until i looked at the pictures on my computer, but there appears to be two objects in one picture and nothing but the moon in the second. well i leave it to you to tell me because no one else(friends) could tell me nothing other than they dont know
content.summary: Circle  with a  glow

content.detailedDescription: At approx 8:50pm on 05/09/07 my friends and i were standing at the lake point and happened to notice what appeared to be a moving star. when i pointed it out we all noticed it was not a shooting star. then we thought it may be a satelite but it was not traveling like a satelite because the path it was going was straight at first but the it dropped and went back up and continued its path, then disappeared. shortly after, we saw another going the same direction, it also dropped and made a check mark like pattern, went back higher than original and then straight. about a minute after that we seen two more which did pretty much the same thing. could these be satelites?? has anyone ever seen anything like this before??
content.summary: 4 lights moving same direction one minute apart and not moving straight

content.detailedDescription:
the witness stated in his e-mail to me :

"i was drivinig south to tonganoxie from leavenworth today on county 
road 5, 
and to the right in a field was a large triangle which looked like it 
might 
have been burnt into a field.  it had an arch at the back of the

coasttocoastam.Com that resembles the shape from the field.

i'm not sure if the craft described made the mark that i saw, but i 
can't 
imagine what would have actually made it."

content.detailedDescription:
I was home with my children in the swimming pool, they sighted the object and they called me to see.  
i tried to relate the object to something that already knew or he/she had seen, but i didn't get, therefore it was different from everything that had already seen.  
this object stayed in the air during approximately 2 hours, being moved slowly, and it only disappeared as it disappeared in the horizon.    
being moved in straight line in the southwest sense for northeast    
the appearance was of a paper leaf in the bass part, and of a small sphere in the superior part.  
i decided to send the picture, because i read a matter in the site www.Ig.Com.Br where has a picture of something very similar in http://igeducacao.Ig.Com.Br/externo.Html?Url=http://area51.Blig.Ig.Com.Br  
matter: ufo photographed yesterday in rio de janeiro
content.summary: Ovni na cidade de pindamonhangaba, sao paulo, brasil

content.detailedDescription:
It was 23.00. o'clock in kristiansand norway. i was with three persons who also was witnesses. i was in my room , then one of the person starts to scream: look at the star! it'���s get larger! it took ca 10 minutes from they thought it was a star until it was so near that we could se it was a craft. i and another witnesses came into the living room where the two other persons where sitting watching tv. then the light enlarged and shifted direction, fall down from the heaven, and flied 500 m otside the house in front of three 'collective apartments' ( i dont know the english word ) with some 100 inhabitants in each other. i dont know if anyone there saw this.
then it shifted direction and came in front of our garden, stopped over a tree for 5 seconds. then we could se some mass dripping from it and a blue light comming from downside the craft and spread around. at the same time the whole craft pulsated. then it flied over the treetops, and immediately we could se that it had three or four landing pads and it swept trought the garden twelve m forward us and we could se it lighteden up the gras. it flew to the other side of the garden, over and disapeared in the night. the garden is large about 100x100 m.
i think the plan was about to land, but since we was three persons, not sleeping they hesitate.
the three eprson i was with was actually shocked. i was teh only person who went silent and just staring. i was not shocked at all.. 
it was what most people will call a very unusual encounter.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Come from the sky,fly over the garden with landing pads.

content.detailedDescription: On my side deck i was looking at the bay an saw a blue/green golfball sized orb onderwater,just under surface.It was flashing on an off moving at 10 feet a second.As it aproached my bulkhead it blinked off and reapeared in my backyard..Then it moved to the woods and did a couple of right turns around pine trees.Then blinked out and reapeared five feet off the bulkhead. it then moved underwater south.I watched this orb for one minute.
content.summary: Golf ball sized blue/green orb in mobile bay, then in my back yard.

cameras.

content.summary: Ufo recorded by panasonic camera on its tape by dr.Ibrahim/www.Ufo-egyptian-hunter.Org

content.detailedDescription:
Date: may 8th, 2007; time: 8.56pm pst: while sitting on my wnw-facing balcony looking towards the pacific ocean, i happened to notice an umoving light in the sky that was not a plane or a star, due to its stagnant position. from 1st observation and after more observation, it seemed like the object was changing colors from white/green/red/blue/yellow, etc. i gathered my binolulars and then a manual telescope for my wife and i to observe these lights.

the object stayed in one place while my wife looked through the binoculars which made clear the rotating colors & the fact that the object was stationery. then appeared another 2nd reddish trajectory - more north - that stopped in mid flight and beamed similar rotating colors. this lasted for at least 20 minutes. later at this time there was also another (similar to the 2nd)  3rd object - this time moving ese -  moving in the distance at a steady slow pace above our balcony view.

this all lasted over 1 hour.

after we lost sight - due do lack of horizonal view - we were ready to retire for the night.

at the last minute i saw, (from the initial vantage point - which is outside -  i.E west
-  the local planes route) a long craft with the same (now static) colors floating slowly along the coastline, we went down to the beach to see if we could photograph it but it had disappeared.

we do have video footage of the first sightings as such btw ... over 8 minutes plus, we'd like for you to see it.

it was not threatening, we had seen something similar but in less detail approximately three years ago which was not as intense or detailed.

hope to hear from you & to hear that other people in the vicinty also saw these objects.

regards,
karl
content.summary: Multi-colored glowing object in the distance

content.detailedDescription: I was outside watching our dog play, having a cigarette and looked up to see a bright white ball going across the sky. i told my youngest daughter to look straight up and ran to get my video camera. she couldn't see it. i told my other two children to go out and look and we went out and started getting video. it was headed from the east to west against the direction of the clouds. it was either in the clouds or just above them. i told my oldest daughter to get the tripod to try to steady the video. while the camera was off and i was putting it on the tripod the ball disappeared. i didn���t see it disappear but my son did. i have the firewire card now but still need to install it and as soon as i do that i can send video through email. the duration was about 2 minutes but i only have a little over a minute of video.
content.summary: Bright white ball moving east to west against the direction of the clouds
